markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Lost Demiplanes](/Articles.aspx?ID=44)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 60

Discover the inner workings of some of the world's most legendary demiplanar demesnes, hexed hideaways, and even entire universes unbound by the laws of nature.
name: Lost Demiplanes
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 60
